Jack Lucas.action: Checks Carmichael's heart and recognizes it is very faint, then slowly backs out of the room scared and panicked.

Jack Lucas.action: Runs away quietly after setting off an alarm, ensuring no one is around before fleeing.

Jack Lucas.action: Props his feet up and settles in to sleep beside Parry's bed after placing the Grail.
